Service Details: - Serves as an initial screening and information resource for Mental Health and Substance Use Services- Staff review concerns and determine the best fit between individuals and community resources, including Mental Health and Substance Use (please note that this is not a counselling session or an assessment)
Eligibility: Individuals presenting with a continuum of mental health and substance use concerns, relationship issues and/or situational stressors
How to Apply: Referrals can be made to Access through self-referral, community agencies or medical professionals
Address & Map: Kelowna Central Health Centre505 Doyle AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 0C5
